alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley; White Mountains of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 22 at 1:58AM PST until February 22 at 1:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes, Owens Valley and White Mountains of Inyo County. * WHEN...Until 1 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley; White Mountains of Inyo County
